This is where I share my notes on IELTS when I have some time to spare. No bulls\*\*t, I promise.

Many of these notes will be very short, and I don't intend to write long tutorials (though there'll certainly be some). IELTS instructions are abundant on the Internet. Here I focus on

/w/simple.title: Simple but correct
/w/simple.content:
ðŸ’¡ Simpler but correct language will earn a better score for vocabulary than inaccurate usage of "advanced" words and phrases.

When you use big words incorrectly, you risk reducing communication and thus capping your vocabulary score at 5.
